column4: I have an image that shows on  my desktop when i disable my desktop in nautilus.  (To the best of my knowledge) I have no other file manager programs running.  I would like that image to go away, help please?
pidgin is a great IM client but not such a great IRC client
I use pidgin a lot... but to each his own (that's what we stand for, anyway)
fair enough.  To be honest, I haven't tried pidgin IRC in a very long time, it may have improved
